channel.title: Comments on: Worldwide Worldview Confusion: Harold Camping, Richard Barcellos, and John Divito

item.title: By: cephas
item.dc:creator: cephas
item.description: Go for it. And we pray that the Lord may use you greatly to instruct the pastors there in Namibia. I hope your course will include materials on cultural redemption as well, our brothers there are seemingly encrouched in syncritistic religious practices. Cephas, Zambia, Ndola
item.content:encoded: Go for it. And we pray that the Lord may use you greatly to instruct the pastors there in Namibia. I hope your course will include materials on cultural redemption as well, our brothers there are seemingly encrouched in syncritistic religious practices. Cephas, Zambia, Ndola
